summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2664, for the improvement of 24th Avenue Northwest and 25th Avenue Northwest, each from West 65th Street to West 70th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by resurfacing, constructing wooden curbs and gutters, concrete sidewalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31375 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
